name: Run It Back (Complete Edition)
description:
This is 'Run It Back (Complete Edition)' - Play as a cute character with a unique twist on this 2D puzzle-platformer!

The game was originally created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2, but this is the post game-jam edition which has bug fixes and further features added. This is the polished and complete edition of the game ^_^

Credits:

Developed by @AileenaCS & @K1LzR

Music from www.bensound.com
